data.actual_result: Nothing sends, and Clyde sends a message about how the message wasn't sent.
data.expected_result: Clyde sends a message that 'the party is over' and you can't join
data.short_description: Join party message doesn't send if music is paused inbetween invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a song playing - Go to any channel - Click on the upload button to invite people to join the session - Before you actually send the invite, pause the song
